column1: I’m proud to endorse @electkmreeveswa for WA’s 10th CD - I know that she’ll be a tireless advocate for our middle class families. #TeamReeves2020 https://t.co/lCb8A6nMxh

I plan to vote in support of both articles of #impeachment against President Trump.  Accountability matters & no president should be given a free pass to use the presidency for their personal gain. https://t.co/HXHdj35dLP
Join me in voting to support @WAFairness & approving R-88 to enact I-1000.  It's a commonsense approach to help achieve greater equality for everyone. #Approve1000 https://t.co/lFVSqQQB8N

I voted to #RaiseTheWage because every American worker deserves a living wage.  This bill would lift millions of families out of poverty and into the middle class.  I'll continue to #FightFor15 until it's enacted into federal law.  https://t.co/f8hiPwcZhQ

I voted to condemn President Trump's racist comments directed at my colleagues yesterday.  His comments are vile and there is no place for these bigoted views in our nation - much less in our government.  https://t.co/S51QBbUvOT

#Juneteenth commemorates the end of slavery in the U.S. Lasting effects of slavery continue to be felt today & more must be done to ensure equitable futures for all. I support H.R. 40 to study and develop reparation proposals for African-Americans.  https://t.co/TOwB5NxnNb

The #DREAMAct was passed in the House yesterday to put millions of young immigrants on a path to U.S. citizenship. It's the first step we must take to fix our immigration system. I'm ready to move this fight forward.  https://t.co/tqEGqMvz98

Today marks the first day of #PrideMonth2019 & also honors the 50th anniversary of the Stonewall Riots. We must honor the advancements made by the LGBTQIA+ community and support further progress in ensuring full and protected rights for all people.  https://t.co/JTRzhVL1ZM
Today and every day let us remember our service members and their families who have made the ultimate sacrifice for our nation. #MemorialDay
I'm proud to have joined with other House Democrats to pass the #EqualityAct yesterday.  It's well past the time that we end discrimination against LGBTQIA+ Americans.  https://t.co/SBLeSAXamC
Alabama's ban on abortion is unequivocally cruel and dangerous. Women must always have the right to choose a safe and legal abortion.

With the middle class increasingly left behind I've introduced the #PROAct w/ my colleagues. Workers must always have the right to organize & this bill is critical to ensuring that all Americans have their fair share of our country's economic growth.  https://t.co/ihiLYtkpka
I wish Muslims in the 9th District and throughout the world a blessed and peaceful Ramadan. #RamadanMubarak

Trump's new religious exemption rule for health care providers is despicable. Every patient deserves quality care for whatever their health care need is. This rule may lead to discrimination against certain populations & I stand vehemently against it.  https://t.co/1kPPF47iAa

I'm working w/ @PramilaJayapal and @CoryBooker in re-introducing the Dignity for Detained Immigrants Act. It'll directly combat AG Barr's decision to indefinitely detain immigrants. This bill is a first step towards fixing our inhumane immigration system.  https://t.co/cH0cs6ZpT7

Happy #InternationalWorkersDay! Everyone must have equality of opportunity & my bill H.R. 2370 will ensure that Congress benefits from a unique diversity of ideas and backgrounds to best serve every constituent.  https://t.co/5tdXMRNj1c

The attack on the synagogue in California is devastating. My deepest sympathies are with the victims their families and the entire Jewish community. Hate and bigotry have no place in our nation and must be condemned.

Happy #EarthDay! Today serves as a reminder of our responsibility to protect and preserve the environment. I am committed to advancing legislation like the #GreenNewDeal that will benefit our Earth and its inhabitants for generations to come.
Thanks to all who came out to the Taste of the 9th last night!  It was a great community celebration of the diverse cultures in the 9th CD. https://t.co/wbmGsMTVhM

It’s bigotry and discrimination to not let transgender people serve in the military ... In the National Defense Authorizing Act which is my bill this year as the chairman of the Armed Services Committee we’re going to reverse this policy.  https://t.co/ss3ILYHfxr

We're just ONE WEEK away from the Taste of the 9th! Join us on April 17 from 6-8pm at the Renton Community Center to celebrate the diverse cultures of the 9th District.   Please RSVP to katherine@electadamsmith.com. Donations are gratefully accepted. https://t.co/H3RgjSDu2U

The ACA provided many Americans access to insurance coverage. Care must be protected. Proud to be a founding member of the #MedicareForAll Caucus and to be working with my colleagues to lead the fight in ensuring that every American has quality healthcare  https://t.co/KXesyWmqNE

Now that the Mueller investigation has concluded it’s imperative that Americans can see the full report. Not only did Russia interfere in our election but the Trump campaign was aware of these Russian efforts. The President’s actions are a threat to the fabric of our democracy.
Enjoyed spending the evening with the 33rd LD yesterday.  We had great conversation and I look forward to more of it! https://t.co/l3eQhdpnSv

The attack on the mosques in New Zealand is devastating. My deepest sympathies are with the victims their families and the entire Muslim community. Hate and bigotry in all forms must be condemned in the U.S. and throughout the world.

I urge acting Secretary Shanahan to wait until courts have made a final decision before implementing the Pentagon's policy that would limit transgender service members. This is a direct attack on our service members & is one that I will not stand for.  https://t.co/VslsMLlhA3

I'm very proud that #HR1 has passed in the House. It's an essential step forward in restoring American democracy. It will expand and protect voting rights reform campaign finance regulations & improve ethics in every branch of the federal government.  https://t.co/oD5Q0MYENC
Proud to support #HR8 & #HR1112 this week.  We must #EndGunViolence. https://t.co/QiDsf94wWb
It’s been great to spend the morning with the King County Democrats. https://t.co/0Qf0QYlPnG
Very pleased to have spent yesterday evening w/ the 41st LD.  It’s always a pleasure to have the opportunity to speak with constituents. https://t.co/EooTO0uMk1

It's egregious that money is being taken to build a wall that serves no national security interest. As Chair of the House Armed Services Committee I will do everything in my power to prevent the president from continuing this disastrous course of action.  https://t.co/RM1rnjb4CX

I’m proud to support the #GreenNewDeal. We must take decisive action to prevent climate change from progressing. Our policies must address issues of income inequality while also supporting clean energy and infrastructure for an economy of tomorrow.  https://t.co/FZIRTDg1Fc
Happy Lunar New Year to all those celebrating.  May the Year of the Pig be a year of happiness innovation and prosperity for all!  https://t.co/LrGZapc8pC

This is a manufactured crisis engineered by [the] President that has harmed hundreds of thousands of Americans.  I will work to ensure that no unnecessary future shutdowns occur.  Our workers and communities must be put first.  https://t.co/7TKSUlT7Lt

SCOTUS’ decision to allow the President to enforce his ban on transgender military personnel is incredibly disappointing. Everyone who wants to serve their country must be allowed to do so w/o discrimination. I'll continue to fight against this policy.  https://t.co/LFrXxkHb6e
Today we honor Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.’s extraordinary life.  We must continue to fight to honor his legacy of advancing opportunity and equal rights for all people.  https://t.co/92oyPovONR

This weekend the #WomensMarch2019 continues its proud tradition of advocacy throughout our country. I’m proud to see so many constituents involved in this larger national conversation surrounding our President & other key advocacy issues.  https://t.co/SdSXvf4Jbz
